titleStmt.title: To his Excellencie the Lord Charls Fleetwood and the rest of the officers of the Army.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. for Livewel Chapman,

notesStmt.note: Signed: From several thousands of faithful friends to the good old cause, in and about the city of London.
Complaining of the Army's neglect of its duty to the country and the cause.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
